concept.title: File Processing Metadata
concept.shortdesc: File Tail logs information about file processing, such as a file name and time it started processing a file.

conbody.p: File Tail originfile processing metadatametadatafrom processing files (File Tail)File Tail passes file processing information to the pipeline through the metadata node. If you do not require this information, connect the metadata node to the Trash destination. To retain this information for review, connect the metadata node any other destination type or route the data as necessary.

The file processing metadata includes the following fields:
fileName Name of the file.
inode Index node information for the file.
time Time that the event occurred.
event Processing event. START indicates that File Tail started processing the specified file. END indicates that File Tail completed processing the contents of the file.
conbody.note: File names can change when a server renames archived files. In this case, the inode most reliably identifies a file.
